title: Will 24/h ranked come out with season 5?
body:
No trouble finding games at 3:59am.

Is this ever going to happen?

replies.body:
Not likely unless if you can magically double the server population.

You want more features/full features of queues?
Go out and get everyone you know to play LoL, regularly at that.
Server pop is too low to sustain Ranked queues at 4-8am.
dude i know how you feel, especially considering i finish work at 12 at night and sometimes later, 1am-7am is my free time rofl
